column4: hey, I was looking at the gutsy installer CD and it had an option to resize existing windows partitions. Is this safe. I know its not guaranteed to be safe but is it on par with say partition magic?
it works pretty well for me.  I resized an NTFS part no prob
did you defragment before doing it?
I did it with a fresh install (I had no partition info because it was an OEM rescue disk)
